name: telepathic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having or showing the ability to know what is in someone else's mind, or to communicate with someone mentally, without using words or other physical signals: The two men have an almost telepathic connection. See
telepathy
More examplesFewer examplesI remember being fascinated and awestruck by the almost telepathic communication they had with their animals. The idea of people with telekinetic or telepathic powers frightens me a little.He believes she has telepathic abilities. Their physical manner wasn't overly demonstrative, and their communication seemed eerily telepathic.It was almost as though there were some telepathic understanding between them. You don't have to be telepathic to know that Maria's romance with Gary can only lead to trouble.
